sentences.en: As usual, Harriet is trying to stir up trouble.
sentences.cn: 像往常一样，哈丽雅特正试图找麻烦。

sentences.en: Don't stir or the sugar will crystallise.
sentences.cn: 不要搅，否则糖会结晶。

sentences.en: Eileen shook him, and he started to stir.
sentences.cn: 艾琳晃了晃他，他开始醒过来。

sentences.en: Give that pan a stir , will you?
sentences.cn: 把那锅东西搅一搅，好吗？

sentences.en: he accused me of trying to stir up trouble.
sentences.cn: 他指责我想闹事。

sentences.en: I can stir my own tea, thank you.
sentences.cn: 我的茶我自己会搅，谢谢。

sentences.en: If one thing could stir his temper or excite his contempt More than another, it was to see a man be fooled by flattery, or elate with popularity.
sentences.cn: 如果说有什么最惹起他的脾气，最能激起他的轻蔑的事情，那就是看到一个人被当成傻瓜大捧特捧，或者因为声望而趾高气扬。

sentences.en: Palm trees stir in the soft Pacific breeze.
sentences.cn: 棕榈树在太平洋和煦的微风中轻轻地摇动。

sentences.en: Remove the bowl from the ice and stir in the cream.
sentences.cn: 从冰里把碗取出，搅入奶油。

sentences.en: Stir in 1 level teaspoon of yeast.
sentences.cn: 加入一平茶匙的酵母后搅拌。

sentences.en: Stir the batter every now and then to keep it from separating.
sentences.cn: 不时搅动面糊，防止其成分散开。

sentences.en: Stir the custard occasionally to prevent a skin forming.
sentences.cn: 要不时地搅拌牛奶蛋糊，防止其表面结皮。

sentences.en: Stir the paint to make sure it is smooth.
sentences.cn: 将油漆搅拌至均匀。

sentences.en: Stir the pork about until it turns white all the way through.
sentences.cn: 不停搅动猪肉，直到它全部变白为止。

sentences.en: Stir the sauce and pour it over the top.
sentences.cn: 搅拌调味汁，把它浇在上面。

sentences.en: Stir the soup for a few seconds.
sentences.cn: 把汤搅动几秒钟。

sentences.en: Stir with a metal spoon until the sugar has dissolved.
sentences.cn: 用金属调羹搅拌至糖融化.

sentences.en: Stir yourself! We've got a visitor.
sentences.cn: 动起来！有客人来了。

sentences.en: Stir-fry the vegetables until crisp.
sentences.cn: 将蔬菜煸炒至变脆。

sentences.en: The poem succeeds in stirring the imagination .
sentences.cn: 这首诗能够激发起想象力。

sentences.en: There was Mrs. Bellingham, stirring sugar into her tea.
sentences.cn: 贝林汉姆太太在那儿把糖加入茶中搅拌。

sentences.en: When a gust of wind blows over, the white yarn curl around, the deviation on the street water, stir spray.
sentences.cn: 这时一阵风猛刮过来，那白纱袅袅地飘去，雨点斜打在街面的积水上，激起朵朵水花。

sentences.en: You can't even stir yourself to have a drink with them.
sentences.cn: 你甚至都懒得去和他们喝一杯。

words.tran_cn: 激动人心的；活跃的，活泼的；忙碌的
搅拌器；搅拌用杓子；煽动者

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式，旧)（人）开始移动；开始行动

trans.tran_en: a feeling of excitement or annoyance
to move a liquid or substance around with a spoon or stick in order to mix it together

trans.tran_cn: 搅动； 摇动； 激动
trans.tran_en: If you stir a liquid or other substance, you move it around or mix it in a container using something such as a spoon

trans.tran_cn: 使打起精神，使奋起，叫醒，唤起
